title: Braised turbot in beer with bacon, shallots and peas
description: Turbot, the king of the sea, is braised in beer with bacon and peas to make this stunning fish supper. The fish is cooked in portions on the bone, but you could braise it whole if you have a large enough pan or fish kettle.
ingredients: 20 small shallots, peeled and left whole
12 garlic cloves, peeled and left whole
1 x 1.5kg/3lb 5oz turbot, fins trimmed, split down the centre and cut into steaks with the bone in
3 tbsp chopped fresh flatleaf parsley, plus extra for garnish
salt and freshly ground black pepper
